check.name: MetadataDatesPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Metadata Dates concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept MetadataDates is present."
if(MetadataDates is not None and len(str(MetadataDates)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "MetadataDates concept is not present"
return False

dialect.name: ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata (CSDGM) Biological Data Profile
Dryad Data Package and Data File Modules

check.name: ResourceCostorFeesPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Cost or Fees concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceCostorFees is present."
if(ResourceCostorFees is not None and len(str(ResourceCostorFees)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceCostorFees concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: ResourceCostorFees
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/distributionFormat/MD_Format/formatDistributor/MD_Distributor/distributionOrderProcess/MD_StandardOrderProcess/fees//*) or (/*/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/distributor/MD_Distributor/distributionOrderProcess/MD_StandardOrderProcess/fees//*) or (/*/Price) or (/DIF/Distribution/Fees) or (/metadata/distinfo/storder/fees) or (/metadata/distinfo/storder/fees) or (/metadata/distinfo/storder/fees)
